titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Department of Biology, Yale University, Records
Department of Biology, Yale University, Records
titlestmt.author: compiled by Daniel Hartwig

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Friday January 11, 2019 at 08:42

did.unittitle: Department of Biology, Yale University, records

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The records consist of correspondence, reports, subject files, and memoranda documenting curriculum, faculty appointments, finance, research, buildings, and students of the Yale Department of Biology. Records concerning the International Society for Cell Biology are also included.

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 14-B (YRG 14-B), Records of academic departments and programs of the Yale Faculty of Arts and Sciences.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: While this collection as a whole is available for research, parts of it may be restricted due to law, university policy or fragility. Any restricted material will be noted as such.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Department of Biology, Yale University, Records (RU 418). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The records are arranged by accession.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The records consist of correspondence, reports, subject files, and memoranda documenting curriculum, faculty appointments, finance, research, buildings, and students of the Yale Department of Biology. Records concerning the International Society for Cell Biology are also included.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Materials in boxes 7-9 are restricted until Jan 1, 2041 as established by Yale Corporation regulations.

did.unittitle: "Suggestions for Preparation of Application for Grant for Research Project"
Biology Department course syllabus and room assignments
Appointments and Financial Papers [restricted until Jan 1, 2041]
Graduate students' records, grants, certification, correspondence
Letters of recommendation and Faculty resumes
Records of Bruce Stowe as chairman of the Dept. of Biology

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Restricted until Jan 1, 2021

did.unittitle: US Ph US Grant Apps. and Reports
Nat. Sci. Found. Undergraduate Res. Payroll and Treasurer
U.S. Public Health Serv. Grant Applications and Correspondence
DEPT. MEETINGS - Dean Yale College, Chairman Biology, FAS Arts Sci. Yale College
LIBRARY - Biology Dept. Library, Kline Library Questionnaire, Kline Library Committee, Library Selection Committee, Various Library Papers-loose-I, Various Library Papers-loose-II
Faculty of Arts and Sciences meetings- more than two years old

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Materials contained in boxes 1 and 2 are restricted until January 1, 2041 due to University policy. Materials in box 3 are open for research.
